sys_ux_client_script.name: Show Delete Comment Alert

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_5cc1c28589653110bbab588193645493
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">d4c1c2858e6531104fb799495de73d99</macroponent><name>Show Delete Comment Alert</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api
}) {
    api.emit("NOW_UXF_PAGE#ADD_NOTIFICATIONS", {
        items: [{
            id: "deleteCommentAlert",
            status: "info",
            icon: "info-circle-outline",
            content: "Comment deleted.",
            action: {
                type: "dismiss"
            }
        }],
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-26 09:51:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>5cc1c28589653110bbab588193645493</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Delete Comment Alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="LOS POC" source="x_1070677_los_po_0">7a4dccfc4761311077acc7de826d43c1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="LOS POC">7a4dccfc4761311077acc7de826d43c1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_5cc1c28589653110bbab588193645493</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-26 09:51:37</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
